fields.description: *Assessment* After setting up an IAM role with an IAM Autoscaling Policy, then creating an instance profile with that IAM role, in the instance using boto 2.14, I saw the following error: {code} BotoServerError: BotoServerError: 403 Forbidden 403 ForbiddenLogin Failure: all modules ignoredLogin Failure: all modules ignored {code} *Signs* Here is the full debugging trace from boto: {code} ubuntu@ip-172-17-185-61:~$ ipython Python 2.7.4 (default, Sep 26 2013, 03:20:26) Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information. IPython 0.13.2 -- An enhanced Interactive Python. ? -> Introduction and overview of IPython's features. %quickref -> Quick reference. help -> Python's own help system. object? -> Details about 'object', use 'object??' for extra details. In [1]: import boto In [2]: boto.set_stream_logger('paws') In [3]: autoscale = boto.connect_autoscale(is_secure=False,port='8773',path='/services/AutoScaling',debug=2) 2013-10-14 07:40:49,605 paws [DEBUG]:Retrieving credentials from metadata server. 2013-10-14 07:40:50,212 paws [DEBUG]:Retrieved credentials will expire in 7:55:12.787109 at: 2013-10-14T15:36:03Z In [4]: autoscale.get_all_policies() 2013-10-14 07:40:55,643 paws [DEBUG]:Method: GET 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Path: /services/AutoScaling/ 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Data: 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Headers: {} 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Host: 10.104.10.6:8773 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Port: 8773 2013-10-14 07:40:55,645 paws [DEBUG]:Params: {'Action': 'DescribePolicies', 'Version': '2011-01-01'} 2013-10-14 07:40:55,645 paws [DEBUG]:establishing HTTP connection: kwargs={'port': '8773', 'timeout': 70} 2013-10-14 07:40:55,645 paws [DEBUG]:Token: ZXVjYQABAo/kX/vb6udpobn3m21GvJy9+o5SJWTxIyHpNWlW4I+Ne8pYTH6godRXlPTYkksmTm3HLFeWSoluwQEAmvLwyhuDIBvJqatnbZv8v+y3/oI96oueBkh/3ZESsFCuMykWk9UoRdgdXKxgIvGltElAHLEpW+Br+qkXbpiI92xgnz1ivYfn8czumfUQ2vidgl/7+BUPmPLg+8o7CS/haMVF8Cs8HGAsvz+VxCqKyHuGETMBTMR1H2qzfg== 2013-10-14 07:40:55,646 paws [DEBUG]:CanonicalRequest: GET /services/AutoScaling/ Action=DescribePolicies&Version=2011-01-01 host:10.104.10.6:8773:8773 x-amz-date:20131014T144055Z x-amz-security-token:ZXVjYQABAo/kX/vb6udpobn3m21GvJy9+o5SJWTxIyHpNWlW4I+Ne8pYTH6godRXlPTYkksmTm3HLFeWSoluwQEAmvLwyhuDIBvJqatnbZv8v+y3/oI96oueBkh/3ZESsFCuMykWk9UoRdgdXKxgIvGltElAHLEpW+Br+qkXbpiI92xgnz1ivYfn8czumfUQ2vidgl/7+BUPmPLg+8o7CS/haMVF8Cs8HGAsvz+VxCqKyHuGETMBTMR1H2qzfg== host;x-amz-date;x-amz-security-token e3b0c44298fc1c149afbf4c8996fb92427ae41e4649b934ca495991b7852b855 2013-10-14 07:40:55,646 paws [DEBUG]:StringToSign: AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 20131014T144055Z 20131014/104/10/aws4_request e3eb6aeb9bb0e09f46981b410770e5dbd7b88f8275dca6b80dde288312b3c2b1 2013-10-14 07:40:55,647 paws [DEBUG]:Signature: a54969b646aaecdf105d6a9e5914c3e51a7f29a3401d49394e1b19db153dd821 2013-10-14 07:40:55,881 paws [DEBUG]:403 ForbiddenLogin Failure: all modules ignoredLogin Failure: all modules ignored 2013-10-14 07:40:55,881 paws [ERROR]:403 Forbidden 2013-10-14 07:40:55,881 paws [ERROR]:403 ForbiddenLogin Failure: all modules ignoredLogin Failure: all modules ignored --------------------------------------------------------------------------- BotoServerError Traceback (most recent call last) in () ----> 1 autoscale.get_all_policies() /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/boto/ec2/autoscale/__init__.pyc in get_all_policies(self, as_group, policy_names, max_records, next_token) 517 params['NextToken'] = next_token 518 return self.get_list('DescribePolicies', params, --> 519 [('member', ScalingPolicy)]) 520 521 def get_all_scaling_process_types(self): /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/boto/connection.pyc in get_list(self, action, params, markers, path, parent, verb) 1115 boto.log.error('%s %s' % (response.status, response.reason)) { 1116 boto.log.error('%s' % body) -> 1117 raise self.ResponseError(response.status, response.reason, body) 1118 1119 def get_object(self, action, params, cls, path='/', BotoServerError: BotoServerError: 403 Forbidden 403 ForbiddenLogin Failure: all modules ignoredLogin Failure: all modules ignored {code} *Steps* * Set up a Eucalyptus 3.4.0 cloud * Set up a non-eucalyptus account user with the following IAM policy: {code} # euare-userlistpolicies --as-account account1 -u user02 --region eucalyptus-admin@ -v ec2-iam-limited { "Statement": [ { "Sid": "Stmt1381496061787", "Action": "ec2:*", "Effect": "Allow", "Resource": "*" }, { "Sid": "Stmt1381496190183", "Action": [ "iam:ListInstanceProfiles", "iam:ListInstanceProfilesForRole", "iam:ListRolePolicies", "iam:ListRoles", "iam:PassRole", ], "Effect": "Allow", "Resource": "*" } ] } {code} * Set up IAM role and instance profile: {code} # iam-rolecreate --aws-credential-file acct1-user1-aws-iam.config --url http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Euare/ -r ACCT1-AS-ACTIONS -s http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Eucalyptus # iam-roleuploadpolicy --aws-credential-file acct1-user1-aws-iam.config --url http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Euare/ -p autoscaling-all -f autoscaling-all-policy -r ACCT1-AS-ACTIONS # cat autoscaling-all-policy { "Statement": [ { "Sid": "Stmt1381544192872", "Action": "autoscaling:*", "Effect": "Allow", "Resource": "*" } ] } # iam-instanceprofilecreate --aws-credential-file acct1-user1-aws-iam.config --url http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Euare/ -r ACCT1-AS-ACTIONS -s instances-autoscaling-all {code} * Launch instance with instance profile with IAM autoscaling policy (in this example the [Ubuntu Raring cloud image|http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/raring/current/raring-server-cloudimg-amd64.tar.gz] was used {code} # euca-run-instances -k account1-user02 emi-C25538DA -t m1.large -z Legend --region account1-user02@ -p arn:aws:iam::735723906303:instance-profile/instances-autoscaling-all --user-data-file cloud-init.config {code} * SSH into the instance; install ipython and python-pip * Upgrade boto to 2.14.0 via pip {code} # sudo pip install --upgrade boto {code} * Set up .boto config file {code} # cat .boto [Boto] autoscale_endpoint = 10.104.10.6:8773 {code} * use ipython and set up boto connection to AutoScaling service, and try to list AS policies {code} ipython Python 2.7.4 (default, Sep 26 2013, 03:20:26) Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information. IPython 0.13.2 -- An enhanced Interactive Python. ? -> Introduction and overview of IPython's features. %quickref -> Quick reference. help -> Python's own help system. object? -> Details about 'object', use 'object??' for extra details. In [1]: import boto In [2]: boto.set_stream_logger('paws') In [3]: autoscale = boto.connect_autoscale(is_secure=False,port='8773',path='/services/AutoScaling',debug=2) 2013-10-14 07:40:49,605 paws [DEBUG]:Retrieving credentials from metadata server. 2013-10-14 07:40:50,212 paws [DEBUG]:Retrieved credentials will expire in 7:55:12.787109 at: 2013-10-14T15:36:03Z In [4]: autoscale.get_all_policies() 2013-10-14 07:40:55,643 paws [DEBUG]:Method: GET 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Path: /services/AutoScaling/ 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Data: 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Headers: {} 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Host: 10.104.10.6:8773 2013-10-14 07:40:55,644 paws [DEBUG]:Port: 8773 2013-10-14 07:40:55,645 paws [DEBUG]:Params: {'Action': 'DescribePolicies', 'Version': '2011-01-01'} 2013-10-14 07:40:55,645 paws [DEBUG]:establishing HTTP connection: kwargs={'port': '8773', 'timeout': 70} 2013-10-14 07:40:55,645 paws fields.summary: IAM Role, Instance Profile with IAM AutoScaling Policy Has Login Failure Error
fields.environment:
*non-HA*

* multi-cluster, Managed networking mode
* one cluster with SC SAN (Equallogic); other cluster with SC overlay (tgtd)

{code}
SERVICE	jetty          	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Jetty  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:eucalyptus:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:10.104.10.6/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:eucalyptus:autoscaling:autoscaling:10.104.10.6/

SERVICE	storage        	Legend         	NoWomanNoCry   	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.1.185:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:Legend:storage:NoWomanNoCry/

SERVICE	euare          	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.6    	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.6:8773/services/Euare  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::euare:10.104.10.6/

SERVICE	cluster        	Exodus         	NaturalMystic  	ENABLED   	30  	http://10.104.10.22:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:Exodus:cluster:NaturalMystic/

{code}

comments.body: This is likely due to the configured URL not ending with a slash, i.e. "/services/AutoScaling/". Some clients send invalid signatures as they sign the URL path as configured but always add a "/" to the URL that is actually used for the request.

Hey [~sjones], I double-checked with/without the slash as well, and got the same error: *with slash* {code} ubuntu@ip-172-17-190-89:~$ ipython Python 2.7.4 (default, Sep 26 2013, 03:20:26) Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information. IPython 0.13.2 -- An enhanced Interactive Python. ? -> Introduction and overview of IPython's features. %quickref -> Quick reference. help -> Python's own help system. object? -> Details about 'object', use 'object??' for extra details. [~hspencer], that could work. You could also try using 169.254.169.254.

[~sjones],

Tried changing the cloud property bootstrap.webservices.port to port 80 and restart the CLC, but that shutdown all User Service API communication to the cloud.  Are there some additional steps that I need to do here to get the cloud to listen to port 80 instead of 8773?

I will try 169.254.169.254 and let you know.   Thanks for the suggestion.

[~sjones],

Changed the endpoint in the boto config file to 169.254.169.254, and it worked.  

* Config in .boto
{code}
ubuntu@euca-172-17-184-187:~$ cat .boto
[Boto]
autoscale_endpoint = 169.254.169.254
{code}
